## DDXNode class

Computes the partial derivative with respect to screen-space X

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class DDXNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns the rate of change of the input value across adjacent pixels in the X direction. Only available in fragment shaders. Useful for computing gradients, detecting edges, and adjusting sampling rates. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
